title: Olympic invitation
creator_credit: Herschells Films and Roy A. Driver
brief_description: The film that is said to have won the approval of the Olympic Games committee in Rome in 1949, and thus won for Melbourne the honour of being chosen as the site for the 1956 Olympic Games. Shows the attractions of Melbourne and in particular its advantages as a venue for the 1956 Olympic Games.
